summary: The diff implements both REQ-29 and REQ-30 by updating HeroSection.tsx and Navigation.tsx to use a VOXA logo image. However, the image file is referenced as 'voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png' rather than the required 'voxa-logo.png', and there is no evidence that any image file was added to frontend/public/assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded VOXA logo image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/voxa-logo.png
missing_requirements.reason: No image file was added in the diff (ADDED FILES: none). The image is also referenced as 'voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png' instead of 'voxa-logo.png' in the code.

missing_requirements.requirement: The logo must be referenced/served as voxa-logo.png per the requirement spec, not voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png
missing_requirements.reason: HeroSection.tsx references '/assets/generated/voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png' instead of '/assets/generated/voxa-logo.png' as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: The navigation bar logo must reference voxa-logo.png, not voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png
missing_requirements.reason: Navigation.tsx references '/assets/generated/voxa-logo.dim_256x256.png' instead of '/assets/generated/voxa-logo.png' as required.
